title: Videoball - Kinda Funny Plays
description:
The boys get together and play Videoball.

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunnygames

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Colin - http://www.twitter.com/NoTaxation
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller, Colin Moriarty, and Tim Gettys talk about the biggest stories in Video Games.

* "it looks they can't you tell yes let sck mov anybody shoots if you're really an OG use the right trigger to shoot no can't do that" -> corrected "sck" to "let's", added periods for clarity

* "I thought that I was dribbling it are there two balls now yeah standard rule set is first to 10 and uh three balls" -> corrected "are" to lowercase, added periods for clarity

* "Tim's experience is shining through here I know I'm trying to I'm trying to get back to when I was slam dunking left and right I still trying to figure it out here they call me I'm here" -> corrected "I'm trying to" to lowercase, added periods for clarity
